Uses of Package
org.codehaus.gmavenplus.groovyworkarounds

Packages that use org.codehaus.gmavenplus.groovyworkarounds
Package
Description
org.codehaus.gmavenplus.groovyworkarounds
Classes to work around issues with Groovy (some of which were fixed in later Groovy versions).
org.codehaus.gmavenplus.mojo
Maven mojos.
  • Classes in org.codehaus.gmavenplus.groovyworkarounds used by org.codehaus.gmavenplus.groovyworkarounds
    Class
    Description
    DotGroovyFile
    This class exists solely to trick JavaStubCompilationUnit.addSource(java.io.File) into letting us use files that don't end in ".groovy" (as a workaround for GROOVY-5021).
  • Classes in org.codehaus.gmavenplus.groovyworkarounds used by org.codehaus.gmavenplus.mojo
    Class
    Description
    GroovyDocTemplateInfo
    This class was taken mostly from the Groovy project (GroovyDocTemplateInfo.java and GroovyDoc.java) because it wasn't available prior to Groovy 1.7.
